content.question: Supporters of the ideas expressed in the image would most likely have favored

choices.label: the rapid industrialization of the West
increases in tariffs on imported goods

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
